item.title: Your Open Innovation Program is Going to Fail. Here’s Why.
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hill
item.description:
First off, it’s not your fault. We’ve all read the articles extolling the virtues of lean start-up; empowering internal employees to experiment and bring forth new products and services. We want our employees to feel engaged, and have an outlet to share their recommendations and suggestions. How could having passionate people contribute ideas for the betterment …

Continue reading "Your Open Innovation Program is Going to Fail. Here’s Why."
